mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_email) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_email, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tbl_member set user_pw = #{user_pw}, user_name = #{user_name}, user_email = #{user_email}, update_date = sysdate where user_id = #{user_id}
